Revitalize.Objects.Crafting.Blueprint.Wo.description: A blueprint used on how to craft an Automatic Farming System at a workbench. Allows for automatically planting or harvesting crops from irrigated garden pots that have the appropriate attachments attached.

A blueprint used on how to craft an auto harvester attachment for irrigated garden pots at a workbench. When used with an automatic farming machine, these can allow for planting harvesting fully grown crops by putting them directly into chests attached to the automatic farming system!

A blueprint used on how to craft an auto planter attachment for irrigated garden pots at a workbench. When used with an automatic farming machine, these can allow for planting seeds directly on irrigated garden pots again!
A blueprint used on how to craft an Irrigated Garden Pot at a workbench which can be used to make garden pots that water themselves!
